title: Citigroup CFO Mark Mason to Present at the Morgan Stanley 10th Annual Financials Conference
summary: New York - Mark Mason, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at the Morgan Stanley 10th Annual Financials Conference on Tuesday, June 11, 2019. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 1 p.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
